main event: A UFO was sighted over Waynesville, Ohio on January 5, 1960 and December 7, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light that hovered in the sky and then suddenly accelerated and disappeared from view.
The object was accompanied by a rumbling sound.
A radar observation on January 12, 1960 detected an object flying at an altitude of 1500-2000 feet, traveling in a straight course and then disappearing from view.

On December 14, 1960, a circular object approximately 50-60 feet in diameter with a flat, gray, metallic-like surface was observed making swift lateral movements, stopping momentarily, and then continuing on a straight course at a very high speed of 600-1,000 mph.
The observer's account was considered credible and the matter was recommended for additional study.
sighted object: bright light, circular object with metallic-like surface
